key_features: No monthly rebates cap, although rebates are capped at 600 SMRT$ per year
Minimum spend of S$500 per statement month to earn maximum rebates across groceries, online shopping, taxi rides (including private hire operators such as Grab and Gojek) and SimplyGo transactions.
Earn up to 5% SMRT$ on groceries [0.3% (base rate) + 4.7% (bonus rate)]
Earn up to 5% SMRT$ on online shopping [0.3% (base rate) + 4.7% (bonus rate)]
Earn up to 5% on taxis and private hire cars [0.3% (base rate) + 4.7% (bonus rate)]
Earn up to 5% SMRT$ for SimplyGo (tap to pay) transactions [0.3% (base rate) + 4.7% (bonus rate)]
Earn 0.3% SMRT$ on all other retail spends

At MoneySmart, we strive to keep our information accurate and up to date. This information may be different from what you see when you visit a financial institution, service provider, or specific product site. MoneySmart shall not be liable to compensate the Customer should the information is not as updated as our Partner.
grocery: Earn up to 5% SMRT$ with monthly min. statement spend of S$500
Note: online groceries transaction will only earn 1 x 5%
online_shopping: Earn up to 5% SMRT$ 5% with monthly min. statement spend of S$500

eligibility: MoneySmart Exclusive Promotion is valid from 20-March 2025 to 31-March-2025
Applicable for New-to Citibank Cardmembers only
Activate the approved Eligible Card via the Citi Mobile App and spend a minimum of S$500 which falls under “Qualifying Spend” within a 30-day period inclusive of account approval date.
Log into your MoneySmart account and submit your claim by 30th April 2025

fees.minimum_monthly_repayment: Current balance if current balance is between S$0 to S$50. For current balance S$50 & above, (i) 1% of the current balance; plus (ii) 1% of any outstanding unbilled instalment amounts; plus (iii) all interest charges (including interest charged under instalment plans); plus (iv) all upfront service fees for instalment plans; plus (v) late payment charges; or S$50 plus any overdue amounts.
